Description: Examine the jumpsuit's overall shape to determine its silhouette. Classify according to the following categories
Examples: Straight, Fitted, Wide Leg, Tapered, Culotte, Blouson, Other, None.

Description: Determine the jumpsuit's fit by how it conforms to the body. Classify the fit into the following categories
Examples: Tight, Loose, Regular, Slim Fit, Relaxed Fit, Other, None.

Description: Identify the style of the jumpsuit's neckline. Classify the neckline style into the following categories
Examples: Crew Neck, V-Neck, Scoop Neck, Halter, Strapless, Square Neck, Other, None.

Description: Observe the style of the jumpsuit's sleeves. Classify the sleeve style into the following categories
Examples: Sleeveless, Cap Sleeves, Short Sleeves, Long Sleeves, Bell Sleeves, Other, None.

Description: Measure the length of the jumpsuit's sleeves. Classify the sleeve length into the following categories
Examples: Sleeveless, Short Sleeve, Three-Quarter Sleeve, Long Sleeve, Other, None.

Description: Examine the style of the jumpsuit's waist. Classify the waist style into the following categories
Examples: Elastic Waist, Drawstring Waist, Fitted Waist, Belted Waist, High Waist, Other, None.

Description: Observe the style of the jumpsuit's legs. Classify the leg style into the following categories
Examples: Straight Leg, Wide Leg, Skinny Leg, Flared Leg, Cropped, Other, None.

Description: Identify the type of closure used on the jumpsuit. Classify the closure type into the following categories
Examples: Zipper, Button, Hook and Eye, Snap, Tie, Other, None.

Description: Check for the presence and style of pockets on the jumpsuit. Classify the pocket style into the following categories
Examples: Side Pockets, Back Pockets, Chest Pockets, No Pockets, Other, None.

Description: Determine the type of fabric used in the jumpsuit's construction. Classify the fabric composition into the following categories
Examples: Cotton, Polyester, Denim, Linen, Jersey, Silk, Velvet, Other, None.

Description: Identify any pattern on the jumpsuit. Classify the pattern into the following categories
Examples: Solid, Striped, Checked, Floral, Geometric, Abstract, Other, None.

Description: Look for any decorative elements on the jumpsuit. Classify into the following categories
Examples: Ruffles, Lace, Embroidery, Sequins, Beading, Cut-outs, Other, None.

Description: Measure the length of the jumpsuit's legs to classify. Classify the leg length into the following categories
Examples: Shorts, Capri, Full Length, Other, None.

Description: Observe the style of the jumpsuit's shoulder straps. Classify the shoulder strap style into the following categories
Examples: Spaghetti Straps, Wide Straps, Sleeveless, Halter, Off-Shoulder, Other, None.
